00140 typedef struct D2H_tag_sAsyncBufferDescriptor
00141 {
00142         // Async info or async data
00143         D2H_eBuffType                           eBuffType;                                                                                      
00144         // If async data, then the index of the host side queue which the buffers are intended for
00145         // If async info, this is ignored
00146         IMG_UINT32                                      ui32DataBufferNum;
00147         // An array of pointers which specify the buffers which are grouped together for a transfer.
00148         // If a group buffer is not being used, set to IMG_NULL
00149         IMG_UINT8                               *       apui8Buffer[ DACOMMS_NUM_GROUPED_BUFFERS ];
00150         // An array of integers which specify the size of each group buffer to transfer.
00151         // If a group buffer is not being used, set to 0.
00152         IMG_UINT32                                      aui32BufferNumBytes[ DACOMMS_NUM_GROUPED_BUFFERS ];
00153 } D2H_sAsyncBufferDesc;
00154

00176     D2H_eAsyncEvent                             eEvent,
00177     img_uint8   *                               pui8Buff,
00178     img_uint32                                  ui32BuffNumBytes
00179 );
